title: any interest in repo canterbury pitt badge/decal

author.location: Essex but I'm nothing like the twats on the telly.

posts.content:
I am in the process of getting some Canterbury Pitt badges/decals/plaque professionally made up , the ones that go either on the side of the cooker or on the outside just below the swage line. They will be in the form of a sticker and not the original metal badge but will not be cheap and nasty. They will be in the correct 6cm x 4cm size and correct colour (black and shiny silver). They will also be laminated so they are durable and will not fade if put on the outside of your bus. I am planning to stick mine onto a piece of stainless or ally plate so it resembles the original plaque then bond it to the outside of my bus.
Obviously it is not cheap to get all this done as i will have to pay for the artwork to be re-done from a photo (cheers funky)so it is of a sufficient standard to be printed onto a sticker.
I am wondering if there is any interest before i commit to going ahead. I would anticipate that each sticker will cost about Â£4 each plus postage at cost ie a stamp.
If intersted please add your name below. If you say you want one please dont back out or i will be left considerably out of pocket.

shalom, Lee
